Vindictus.Glutton's Banquet Evil Core+ Event:

[u][b]Event Details[/b][/u
Vindictus.Waiting for Spring Vending Machine Event:
u]Event Period[/u]
[/b]Feb 25th, 2025 (After Maintenance) - Mar 25th, 2025 (Before Maintenance)

[b][u]Exchange Shop Period[/u]
[/b]Feb 25th, 2025 (After Maintenance) - Apr 1st, 2025 (Before Maintenance)
(* Per Character Event)

[u][b]Event Details[/b][/u]

1. Obtain up to 20 [u]Spring Vending Machine Tokens[/u] via Mail.
- The weekly limit resets every Tuesday at 7 AM UTC.
2. With the Tokens, select your desired missions during the event period, and complete them to receive various rewards.
- You can select Limited Missions and Normal Missions.
- You can only purchase one each Limited Mission once per week during the event period, resetting every Tuesday at 7 AM UTC.

[u][b]Missions[/b][/u]
[table][tr][td][b]Limited Misisons[/b][/td][/tr][tr][td]Raid Battle - Clear four times without dying[/td][/tr][tr][td]Raid Battle - Set up a Campfire five times[/td][/tr][tr][td]Use an Active Skill ten times[/td][/tr][/table][list][*]Mission Completion Reward: [u]Waiting for Spring Vending Machine Box[/u][/*][/list]
 
[table][tr][td][b]Normal Misisons[/b][/td][/tr][tr][td]Complete Lv.110+ Region Raid Battles four times[/td][/tr][tr][td]Conquer Space Time Distortion Battle once[/td][/tr][tr][td]Conquer Redeemers Battle two times[/td][/tr][tr][td]Conquer Special Dungeon two times[/td][/tr][tr][td]Conquer Royal Army Battles two times[/td][/tr][tr][td]Conquer Niflheim Battles three times[/td][/tr][tr][td]Conquer Red Moon's Energy Battles three times[/td][/tr][tr][td]Conquer Lv.30+ Normal Battles ten times[/td][/tr][/table][list][*]Mission Completion Reward: [u]Waiting for Spring Vending Machine Coupon[/u][/*][/list]
(* Detailed List of eligible battles are listed at the end of the page)

[u][b]Note[/b][/u]
[list][*]Even if you complete eligible battles without purchasing the Vending Machine Mission, you will instantly receive your reward upon purchasing the specific mission.[/*][/list][list][*]The number of battle clear counts for the missions resets on the following day at 7 AM UTC.[/*][/list][list][*]Missions that are already purchased will not reset until the end of the event, even if you do not fill the completion count on the same day.[/*][/list][list][*]The mail containing the Waiting for Spring Vending Machine Token will expire 7 days after distribution and be deleted.[/*][/list][list][*]Event items that are not specified as Account Sharable or Able to use Shared Storage are all bound to the character that acquired them.[/*][/list][list][*]Some event items have an expiration date fixed on the item tooltip.[/*][/list]
